name: DJ Whip VR
description:
This is a dynamic casual and arcade VR game in which you cut enemies by whip and defend yourself with a shield from their deadly shots.

The battle takes place on the dance floor, to the sounds of inflammable electronic dance music. The game is mixing samples of different rhythms and melodies in real time depending on the way you cut objects. With the whip you can add additional sounds and effects to the music to make the mix more exciting. Everything in the game is moving to the rhythm of your music.

Chop your enemies, score points and mix the longest and the most beautiful music set.
